title: Virtual Room: Virtual Reality Singapore | Virtual Room Singapore
location: New Bridge Road, 211, Basement 3, Lucky Chinatown, Singapore, 059432
description:
Virtual Room is Singapore’s only virtual reality experience specifically designed for corporate teams and social groups (not gamers). Designed to foster communication, collaboration and mutual support among players – it is the ideal team building activity.

Blending the escape room concept with a full 3D cinematic experience to deliver a unique, immersive and mind-blowing adventure lasting ~40-50 minutes. 

Players work together in teams of 2 to 4 to cooperate, solve problems, conquer the mission and save the world! BUT there’s a twist – it is so much fun and has such a WOW factor that teams won’t even know it’s a team-building exercise.

Your mission is to save the world and your team of 2-4 players will travel back into historical time periods such as ancient Egypt and the moon landing to solve the puzzles and challenges.  

Guaranteed no motion sickness unlike inferior VR experiences (e.g. ones where you are sitting down or using poor quality VR headsets)

It’s unlike anything you’ve ever experienced before - immersion, freedom, adrenaline, the ultimate thrill!

Fun for all ages (no gore or horror) - friends, families (ages 10+), birthday parties, kids’ parties, hens/bucks nights, school groups and corporate team building.

location: One 15 Marina Club, Sentosa Cove, Singapore, 098497
description:
This is a 2011 Yacht. We did a major facelift in August 2015. We build an additional toilet at the stern’s wet deck, install a brand new 48” LED TV in the Saloon. We are also in the process of building a first of its kind in Singapore Water Slide on board our Yacht.

If you are looking for fun water activities, this yacht provides a lot of water toys to ensure you will never have a dull moment. This is the yacht for divers as well, as we have diving racks installed and our captain is a certified diving instructor.

title: Superyacht Megaway 128 | Entire Boat
description:
This classic superyacht combines immaculate contemporary interiors with ample alfresco areas.

A generously-sized flybridge offering remarkable panoramic views makes for the perfect backdrop for corporate and private events.

title: Charter Me Too | Entire Boat
location: One 15 Marina Club, Sentosa Cove, Singapore, 098497
description:
It can comfortably accommodate 30 guests.

This luxurious Catamaran is designed to impress, to excite, to seduce, to titillate and to mesmerize even the most seasoned and demanding seafarer.

title: Achates | Entire Boat
location: One 15 Marina Club, Sentosa Cove, Singapore, 098497
description: Achates, a 2012 Sealine flybridge cruiser, features a lush wooden interior and a well-equipped kitchen. Offering a spacious cockpit and a large saloon, this beauty is perfect for your intimate social gathering.

title: Catamaran Kucinta | Entire Boat
description:
Kucinta is equipped with a kitchenette and audio-visual amenities, including a Bluetooth-enabled entertainment system and a Touchscreen karaoke system.

She is available for private and corporate bookings.

title: No Name II | Entire Boat
location: One 15 Marina Club, Sentosa Cove, Singapore, 098497
description:
For the essence of yachting at the port or out to sea, the Lan Kwai Fong defines cruising and entertainment with pleasing aesthetics and simple operation. 

She is a beautiful and innovative design, with advanced industrial engineering and world-class manufacturing, raising the standard of excellence in yachting.

title: SG Yacht | Entire Boat
description:
The aft stateroom has a queen-size berth, hanging lockers, private head compartment with shower and sliding door access to the cockpit.

Forward, the guest stateroom offers a large double berth, along with private access to the forward head and lots of storage.

The salon features a conversation pit with two facing sofas and a coffee table, tub chair, and a well-equipped entertainment system.

title: Sunreef 62 | Entire Boat
description:
The yacht is air-conditioned throughout and boasts 4 en-suite double cabins. Her fully equipped kitchen includes a fridge, freezer, ice maker, oven and microwave.

The spacious saloon area is ideal for entertaining and is fitted with an impressive Harman/Kardon surround-sound stereo system, complete with 2 outdoor loudspeakers, and a widescreen LG 42″ TV and DVD player.

The yacht has expansive lounging areas across her aft deck, nets, and flybridge. Her spacious design makes her the perfect yacht to relax and unwind as you discover the delights of cruising in Singapore waters.

title: HERE | Entire Venue
description: The venue is well-furnished with a suite of amenities to cater to a wide spectrum of events ranging from corporate events such as business meetings, seminars, workshops and product launches to recreational events like team-bonding, cohesion, award ceremonies, celebrations, and the list goes on.

title: ClubCo The Quadrant | Rooftop Terrace
description:
Housed at the top of the historical Quadrant building is a beautiful private rooftop terrace that features both an indoor & outdoor space. Decorated with colourful furniture, plush cushions and artificial grass, this space exudes a cheery and fun vibe which makes it perfect for private events, team retreats and casual meetings.
 
The rooftop space itself can take up to 30 persons indoors and a combined capacity of 60 persons in total. The indoor space is airconditioned and has a communal pantry for all your party needs. We also provide high speed WiFi, TV screen and projector to cater to your business meetings.
 
At ClubCo, we are committed to helping you plan your event and bringing it to success. We also provide catering options to make planning easier for you. Need an event space? Talk to our community manager now!

The Rooftop Terrace can accommodate up to 50 people.

This space is perfect for breakouts and social events.

title: 360 Lounge | Whole Venue
description:
Here at 360 Lounge, we aim to provide an unforgettable experience within our chic and urban space without having to stress. 

We cater to everything from parties, corporate events, product launches to even birthday parties, baby showers, and D&Ds. We have an array of alcoholic and nonalcoholic beverage menu to suit your preference. Each experience with us is customized and tailored to your needs. 

With us, you can relax and leave your event as we provide meticulous event planning services.

title: Sage Restaurant & Bar | Entire Venue
description:
With a vast indoor seating surrounded by glass doors and refreshing alfresco space, as well as delectable canapé platters and western-style course meal choices, our versatile space would definitely impress your guests.

Inspired by the contemporary fusion cuisine, each dish is specially curated to tantalize and delight your taste buds, paired with the ideal mix of a lively atmosphere, laid-back setting, along with our dedicated event venue and catering services, SAGE is committed to providing a cozy yet gastronomic dining experience.

title: Restaurant JAG | Dining Room
description:
Under the stewardship of Anant, an industry veteran and a restaurant manager behind some of Singapore’s finest establishments, diners will be greeted with warmth with no detail overlooked.

With only seven tables, the intimate dining room, elegant in its simplicity reflects the purity of the food served from the custom-built kitchen, which diners have a direct view of.

title: Plentyfull | Plentyfull Elevated Area
description:
This elevated semi-private area in Plentyfull can cater to up to 30 people in a dining layout. 

Presentation, networking, office and a private party of a small group are ideal for this space. We can provide also provide a projector if requested.

title: Plentyfull | Plentyfull Private Dining Room
description:
Groups of 8 in a seated layout can be accommodated in our private room with an optional view of the pastry kitchen.

This is perfect for a more intimate and private occasion with family or friends. It can also be hired for informal meetings, presentations, and workshops. We have a projector available upon request.

title: Blue Lotus Kitchen + Bar | Al fresco
description:
Our Al fresco area can accommodate up to 48 people in a seated layout.

This spot offers a more relaxed-outdoor ambience.

This space promises a fresh new experience with delicious food and a unique set up.

title: Little Island Brewing Co. | Beer Hall & Beer Garden
description:
Two huge units of indoor seating and alfresco seating, a playground for the kids, a window into the brewery, there’s hardly anywhere in skyscraper Singapore that’s like us. 

Beer Hall & Beer Garden is a beautiful cozy space where you can relax and enjoy life. Sea breeze, rustling trees, and starry skies come free of charge!

title: The Hive Lavender | Hive Café & Event Space
description: A high-ceiling interior space suitable for workshop seminars, galleries, performances, and social functions.

title: the Hive New Bridge Road | Rooftop Lounge & Terrace
description:
This unique event space offers both an indoor and outdoor area. The indoor lounge is suitable for Seminars, Workshops and Corporate Off-sites while the outdoor terrace is great for hosting Movie Screenings, Fitness Classes and Social Functions.

The space is equipped with High-Speed WiFi, a Mini Kitchen, Projector and Screen, and a Sound System (Wireless Microphone & Speaker).

title: Design Hub Rooftop Event Space | Entire Venue
description:
Located on the 14th Floor of our Design Hub Building this sprawling 6000 sqft space with panoramic views of the Straits of Johor, is a Flexi Indoor and Outdoor space for all types of events, with a built-in Food & Beverage food service counter and bar. 

We are able to house anywhere from 25pax - 250 pax of your guests. We provide FREE Parking with ample parking space. We also house Food & Beverage outlets Greenhouse Cafe and Subway on the ground floor for any catering needs if required. We are open to external catering as well with Orange Clove as our preferred partner.

title: 1919 Waterboathouse | Rooftop Bar
description:
A quaint location perfectly positioned where the Quay canals meet the Marina Bay. A scenic spot that offers the best of both worlds - casual yet intimate.

There is no better way than enjoying signature drinks & being romanced under the city lights.

title: Jayleen 1918 | Roof Deck Alfresco dining
description:
Have your Birthday, Wedding Reception, Corporate Cocktailat our Roof Top Terrace.

Our Rooftop Terrace on the 7th floor, offers a rare direct view of the Singapore River in its most charming meandering form, where the backdrop is the Esplanade, both the new and old Parliament Houses, Fullerton Hotel, The Singapore Flyer, and the Marina Bay Sands Integrated Resort.

Guests can enjoy comfortable Outdoor arm-chairs and Deck chairs while relaxing over the view of the river and the heart of the CBD of Singapore. At night, with binoculars/telescopes on request, an opportunity to view the stars or dine under the stars, and view the world in a different light.

title: Motoryacht Dreamss | Entire Boat
description:
This boat is perfect for staging your cosy getaway.

Motoryacht Dreamss can hold a maximum of 13 people seated and standing set up.

This boat is equipped with a flat-screen TV.

title: Motoryacht Step One | Entire Boat
description:
This boat is equipped with a microwave oven, refrigerator, electric kettle, coffee maker.

It can accommodate up to 13 people maximum on both standing and seated layout.

title: Tall Ship Adventures | The Royal Albatross
description:
The Royal Albatross is the definition of Unique, one of a kind and not to be found anywhere in the world. 

She offers a truly exceptional experience that bonds her guests, sharing a lifelong memory.

title: The Hive Carpenter | 8 Pax Meeting Room
description:
This meeting room is ideal for board meetings, video conferencing and presentations for 8 to 10 people. 

The room has access to the Hive Lounge.

title: The Hive Carpenter | 4 Pax Meeting Room
description:
This 4 pax meeting room is suitable for small scale presentations, meetings and video conferences.

The room has access to the Hive Lounge.

title: Deck | Courtyard
description: The courtyard is an outdoor set up that can hold up to 120 people in a seated layout.

title: LivingwithArt Gallery | Fine Art Wing
description:
The medium hall can be hired exclusively and is perfect for informal events.  

This beautiful space can be hired for an array of events and occasions.

title: LivingwithArt Gallery | Main Gallery
description:
The Main gallery can hold up to 80 people. This can be hired for exhibitions and dining events.

With the flexible setting and eccentric decor, the gallery promises a one of a kind experience for your next celebration.

title: Empire Sky Lounge | Entire Space
description:
Empire runs as a cozy lounge during the evening, only to go through a complete transformation by night. 

Watch the cityscape light up after a mesmerizing sunset amid plush surrounds. Party-goers can bet on Empire to always be rocking an epic party with lively DJ beats on-air amidst buildings illuminated at dusk.

title: Found8 Prinsep | Townhall
description:
Perfect for networking or speaker events, hackathons and receptions 

120 guests theatre-style

title: 360 Lounge | Semi-Private Space
description:
Our Semi-Private space is a modern space which with beautiful views and atmospheric lightning will create a one-of-a-kind event for you and your guests.

This space can comfortably take up to 20 guests standing and 10 seated. 

Perfect for private parties, birthday celebrations and other social gatherings.

title: Shake Farm HQ | Three Levels Buy Out
description:
All 3 levels of Shake Farm HQ are available for exclusive hire for your own private event! 

Each level can have its own atmosphere and functionality. With all the free amenities included in the rental, such as projector, flip-charts, a/v system, high-speed wifi, furniture set up, event staff assistance we can help you create a uniquely memorable experience!

title: Shake Farm HQ | Level 2
description:
Level 2 is a cozy lounge within the charming Shake Farm HQ. It has all the small details such as an electric fire place, fun cats arts, comfortable sofas which make this room so relaxing and make every guest feel like home. 

Be it a drinks reception, a corporate team-bonding, networking, media showcase or a birthday celebration, we can make it the most special and memorable experience for you.

title: Rakuya | Whole Venue
description:
The Whole Venue at Rakuya is a combination of two beautiful other spaces - Sake Bar and Omakase Bar.

This lovely space has a standing capacity of 60 guests and a dining one of 30, making it perfect for numerous events, such as team building, family celebrations, corporate events, receptions and more.

title: Rakuya | Sake Bar
description:
Sake Bar at Rakuya is one of our unique spaces, which can take up to 8 guests dining. 

This space has a one-of-a-kind atmosphere, created by its interesting design  - with a beautiful round bar table and stunning paintings on the walls, your guests will remember your event for long!

Perfect for private dining, family celebrations and other social gatherings.

title: DC Comics Super Heroes Cafe | Main Restaurant
description:
The main Restaurant is great for those who love DC characters. This is a good place for children and families. 

It can be hired for private occasions and office parties. This can hold up to 110 people in a standing layout.

The space has a DC iconography everywhere. We would love to create a memorable dining experience for you.

title: Workcentral | Brew House
description:
Workcentral’s in-house pantry and social hub where members can unwind and recharge with a cup of tea and a quick snack from the honesty bar.

A perfect space for networking, your clients are also welcome here; invite them to discuss your next groundbreaking deal at ease.

title: Picnic Urban Food Park | Flower Garden
description:
Dine surrounded by fresh flowers. At Flower Garden, take in the ambiance as you sit back with a favorite dish at Picnic. 

With a range of cuisines like Korean, Italian, Japanese, and many others to choose from, everyone gets to have what they like. Come experience the Picnic atmosphere at Wisma Atria Level 3.

title: Grand Park Orchard | Bar Canary
description:
An idyllic oasis above the hustle and bustle of Orchard Road and set amidst an astroturf setting, one can simply kick off their shoes to chill under mesmerizing fairy lights at the lush and laidback Bar Canary.  

A green oasis with faux grass.

title: Picnic Urban Food Park | Entire Venue
description:
The atmosphere here is so fun and inviting with all the insta-worthy decor, it's bound to be a hit with the hipster crowd. Not to mention the variety of cuisines in one spot makes it an even more delightful experience for any foodie.

Good food, good place, great times!

title: 1919 Waterboathouse | Restaurant with Patio
description:
1919 transitions seamlessly from corporate lunches to classic dinners.  

This space is great for social gatherings and corporate functions and can fit up to 400 people in standing layout.

title: The Best Brew | Outdoor Terrace
description:
This area can seat up to 70 people and can also comfortably accommodate up to 90 people standing.

It can be hired for small corporate parties as well as less formal private parties.

title: PocoLoco Microbrewery @ Jurong | The Outside
description:
The Outside at PocoLoco Microbrewery is a lovely terrace filled with fresh air and surrounded by beautiful trees, creating a one-of-a-kind atmosphere.

This space has a capacity of 50 guests seated and is just a perfect choice for summer parties. Besides those, it could also be amazing for numerous other events such as private dining, promotional events, social parties and corporate events.

title: Orchard Rendezvous Hotel, Singapore | Poolside
description: Our Mediterranean inspired architecture provides you with the perfect backdrop and can accommodate up to 150 guests with a standing cocktail set up.

title: ONE°15 Marina Sentosa Cove | NOVA Room
description:
Perched a the top of the Iconic Glass Tower which is constructed in the shape of a ship’s hull, NOVA is dressed in floor-to-ceiling glass windows that offer panoramic views of the marina and surrounding greenery. 

Be it night or daytime celebration, guests will be drawn into the spectacular sense of grandeur and openness

title: ONE°15 Marina Sentosa Cove | Rooftop Terrace
description:
Rooftop Terrace gives you idyllic views of the marina, glorious sunset and more. The charming alfresco setting affords natural majesty that makes every event as picturesque as it is unique. 

For those with a preference for a more extravagant setting, the Rooftop Terrace can be filled with stunning floral arrangements or decorations to evoke the luxury of formal celebrations. Host your birthday or wedding, or any other event on the rooftop and your memories will never fade!

title: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge | Terrace Lounge
location: Collyer Quay, Ocean Financial Centre, Level 43, 10, Singapore, 049315
description: Zafferano, alfresco terrace is great for drinks and light bites with pulsating beats ringing through the air to accompany you as you catch the sunset at dusk or admire the glittering Marina Bay skyline at night.

title: PARKROYAL COLLECTION Pickering | Outdoor Terrace
description: The Outdoor Terrace is an exciting outdoor venue that provides a stunning backdrop for private solemnizations, cocktail parties and informal gatherings of up to 100 guests.

title: RIZU Modern Japanese Cuisine | Entire Venue
description:
Chill out to relaxing jazz in an intimate indoor that seats just 30 guests. Rizu is perfect for all occasions, small or large. 

RIZU offers a selection of top-notch sake, wine, and champagne as an Omakase pairing option.

title: Maison Miaja Event Spaces | Salon Jean Nouvel
description: Salon Jean Nouvel at Maison Miaja is one of Singapore’s newest art and design spaces, housed on the 2nd floor of the APS Building, this 3400 square feet space is located within walking distance from Robertson Quay and Clarke Quay, in River Valley.
